entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
